page.browser.description: Puppeteer - returns the browser the page belongs to

page.click.description: Puppeteer - clicks in the center of an element within the page

page.content.description: Puppeteer - returns the full HTML contents of the page

page.focus.description: Puppeteer - focuses an element within the page

page.goBack.description: Puppeteer - navigates to the previous page in the history

page.goForward.description: Puppeteer - navigates to the next page in the history

page.goto.description: Puppeteer - navigates the page to a URL

page.hover.description: Puppeteer - hovers over the center of an element within the page

page.pdf.description: Puppeteer - generates a PDF from the page

page.screenshot.description: Puppeteer - generates a screenshot of the page

page.waitFor.description: Puppeteer - waits until an element/predicate/timeout within the page is resolved

page.waitForFunction.description: Puppeteer - waits until a predicate within the page returns a truthy value

page.waitForNavigation.description: Puppeteer - waits until the page navigates to a new URL or reloads

page.waitForRequest.description: Puppeteer - waits until a request by URL/predicate is resolved

page.waitForResponse.description: Puppeteer - waits until a response by URL/predicate is resolved

page.waitForSelector.description: Puppeteer - waits until an element (by selector) is appeared in the page

page.waitForXPath.description: Puppeteer - waits until an element (by XPath) is appeared in the page

page.on('close').description: Puppeteer - emitted when the page is closed

page.on('console').description: Puppeteer - emitted when a script within the page calls one of console API methods

page.on('dialog').description: Puppeteer - emitted when a dialog appears in the page

page.on('domcontentloaded').description: Puppeteer - emitted when the `DOMContentLoaded` event of the page is dispatched

page.on('error').description: Puppeteer - emitted when the page crashes

page.on('frameattached').description: Puppeteer - emitted when a frame within the page is attached

page.on('framedetached').description: Puppeteer - emitted when a frame within the page is detached

page.on('framenavigated').description: Puppeteer - emitted when a frame within the page is navigated to a new url

page.on('load').description: Puppeteer - emitted when the `load` event of the page is dispatched

page.on('metrics').description: Puppeteer - emitted when a script within the page invokes `console.timeStamp`

page.on('pageerror').description: Puppeteer - emitted when an uncaught exception happens within the page

page.on('popup').description: Puppeteer - emitted when the page opens a new tab or window

page.on('request').description: Puppeteer - emitted when the request is issued by the page

page.on('requestfailed').description: Puppeteer - emitted when a request fails

page.on('requestfinished').description: Puppeteer - emitted when a request finishes successfully
